short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customise your online reading experience by replacing unwanted names and y/n tags with more desirable ones!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Customise your AO3 experience by replacing y/n or unwanted names with more desirable ones!
No longer try to awkwardly ignore the fact that your ex is the main character while you read!



*********************************************************************
This is a standalone extension that provides unique functionality not found in any of the following extensions:
- ao3-disco 
- ao3-enhancements
- ao3-progress-bookmark
- any other extensions tagged ao3: https://chromewebstore.google.com/search/ao3

This is my first and only submitted chrome extension
This extension does not send notifications to the user in any way
This extension does not send messages on the users behalf in any way
